mapper.sql: id, CNName, ENName, views, weight, logourl, createid, description, imgurl, status, owner, certificate, webSite, publishTime, checkTime, lastModifyTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_p_brand (id, CNName, ENName, logourl, createid, description, imgurl, status, owner, certificate, webSite, publishTime, checkTime, lastModifyTime) VALUES (#{id},#{CNName}, #{ENName}, #{logourl}, #{createid}, #{description}, #{imgurl}, 1, #{owner}, #{certificate}, #{webSite}, #{publishTime},now(),#{lastModifyTime})
mapper.update:
update t_p_brand
CNName = #{CNName},
ENName = #{ENName},
views = #{views},
logourl = #{logourl},
description = #{description},
imgurl = #{imgurl},
owner = #{owner},
certificate = #{certificate},
webSite = #{webSite},
status = #{status},
lastModifyTime = #{lastModifyTime},
checkTime = now(),
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select distinct b.id,b.CNName,b.ENName, b.views, b.weight, b.logourl, b.createid, b.description, b.imgurl, b.status, b.owner, b.certificate, b.webSite, b.publishTime, b.checkTime, b.lastModifyTime from t_p_brand b left join t_p_product p on b.id = p.brandid where b.createid = #{createid} and b.status !=3
and b.status = #{status}

select COUNT(*) from t_p_brand where createid = #{createid} and status !=3
and status = #{status}
SELECT DISTINCT b.id AS code, b.logourl AS name FROM t_p_brand_sys bs LEFT JOIN t_p_brand b ON bs.brandid = b.id WHERE bs.scateid = #{scateid} and b.status = 1
SELECT DISTINCT b.id AS code, b.CNName AS name FROM t_p_brand_sys bs LEFT JOIN t_p_brand b ON bs.brandid = b.id WHERE bs.scateid = #{scateid} and b.status = 1
SELECT id AS code, CNName AS name, logourl AS smallIcon FROM t_p_brand WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT DISTINCT b.id, b.CNName, bs.scateid FROM t_p_brand_sys bs LEFT JOIN t_p_brand b ON bs.brandid = b.id WHERE b.status = 1 ORDER BY b.weight DESC, b.id
SELECT DISTINCT b.id, b.CNName, p.scateid, b.logourl FROM t_p_product p LEFT JOIN t_p_brand b ON b.id = p.brandid WHERE b.status = 1 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY b.views DESC

SELECT m.enterpriseName, m.address, m.province, m.city, m.area, m.enterpriseTelephone, b.webSite, b.imgurl, b.description, b.CNName, b.id, b.logourl FROM t_p_brand b LEFT JOIN t_m_member m ON b.createid = m.id WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT count(1) count FROM t_p_brand t WHERE t.status = 1 AND t.createid = #{createId} union all SELECT count(1) count FROM t_p_product p WHERE p.status = 1 AND p.createid = #{createId} union all SELECT count(1) count FROM t_p_brand_agent a WHERE a.status = 0 AND a.createid = #{createId}

SELECT ad.connectedId AS id, ad.imgUrl AS brandLogo, b.CNName FROM t_sys_advertising ad LEFT JOIN t_sys_adv_attr at ON at.id = ad.advAttrId LEFT JOIN t_p_brand b ON b.id = ad.connectedId WHERE at.chanType = #{chanType} AND at.page = #{page} AND at.advArea = #{advArea} order by ad.sort asc
SELECT id, CNName, ENName FROM t_p_brand WHERE STATUS = 1 AND ( CNName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') OR ENName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') ) LIMIT #{count}
